name: thicket stitch washcloth
sizes_available: washcloth: 8.25" x 8.25" / 21cm x 21cm, tea towel: 14.5" x 22" / 37cm x 56cm
notes:
> **crochet dishcloth series!
** > ======================================= > this design is part of a larger collection of dishcloth patterns, all of which feature a unique stitch pattern.
> find out more here → **[ned & mimi crochet dishcloth series][1]** **thicket stitch washcloth** ======================================= this dishcloth and tea towel pattern is a quick and easy project for crocheters of all skill levels. the pattern is written for 2 sizes - dishcloth and tea towel - but also includes instructions for adjusting the stitch pattern to make a custom size. the pattern also comes with a video tutorial. **materials** yarn: any weight 4/worsted weight yarn in a cotton or cotton blend. * dishcloth: 80yds / 73m * tea towel: 350yds / 320m **recommended yarns:** * [wecrochet dishie][2] * [paintbox yarns cotton aran][3] * [aran lion brand 24/7 cotton][4] * [rico creative cotton aran][5] hook: [5.5mm (i-9) crochet hook][6] --- **join my newsletter!** ======================================== [subscribe to my newsletter][7] to be kept in the loop about pattern releases, freebies, sales and much more! ---- © ned & mimi 2023 you are free to use this pattern to create finished products for sale, in fact i would be honoured! if selling finished products from this pattern online, i do ask that you give credit for the pattern to ned & mimi, and link back to http://www.nedandmimi.com. *due to the nature of the pdf files sales, i cannot refund any patterns (as it is not possible to 'return' the purchase). however, i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns.* *the photographs and pattern contained in this pattern are the property of ned & mimi ©. this pattern is for personal use only. no unauthorized reproduction, in whole or in part, or distribution of this pattern or content is permitted.* [1]: https://nedandmimi.com/free-crochet-dishcloth-patterns/ [2]: https://shrsl.com/4cok0 [3]: https://www.lovecrafts.com/en-us/p/paintbox-yarns-cotton-aran?utm_medium=affiliate&a_aid=c1d083d7 [4]: https://lovecrafts.com/en-us/p/lion-brand-24-7-cotton?utm_medium=affiliate&a_aid=c1d083d7 [5]: https://www.lovecrafts.com/en-us/p/rico-creative-cotton-aran?utm_medium=affiliate&a_aid=c1d083d7 [6]: https://shrsl.com/3p74i [7]: https://nedandmimi.com/subscribe
